messages.content: I live in El Born, Barcelona. The gothic architecture and beach sunsets.
That sounds wonderful! What do you enjoy most about living there?
Every Saturday I love morning at La Boqueria market then walking to Barceloneta beach.
That sounds like a great weekend routine!
My neighbor Jordi, a chef who brings me leftover tapas from his restaurant. We've become good friends.
It's nice to have friendly neighbors!
For breakfast I usually have cortado and pan con tomate at a tiny bar on Passeig del Born.
Sounds delicious!
I'm relocating to Gamla Stan, Stockholm for a photography project!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be exploring antique shops in the old town then fika at Stortorget.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have kanelbulle and bryggkaffe at a tiny café on Prästgatan.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Gamla Stan, Stockholm for a few weeks now. I love the colorful 17th-century buildings and narrow alleys.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Erik, an architect who shows me hidden medieval passages.
What a wonderful connection!
I'm relocating to Coyoacán, Mexico City for a language immersion program!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be visiting the Coyoacán market for handcrafts and street food.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have chilaquiles verdes and café de olla at a local fonda.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Coyoacán, Mexico City for a few weeks now. I love the colorful colonial houses and Frida Kahlo museum nearby.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Elena, a muralist who shows me hidden street art around the barrio.
What a wonderful connection!
I'm relocating to Bondi, Sydney for a consulting contract!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be sunrise yoga on Bondi Beach followed by brunch at Bills.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have açaí bowl and flat white at a beachside café.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Bondi, Sydney for a few weeks now. I love the coastal walk and beach lifestyle.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Liam, a surf instructor who is teaching me to ride waves.
What a wonderful connection!
I'm relocating to Shimokitazawa, Tokyo for an art residency!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be thrift shopping for vintage denim then live jazz at a tiny bar.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have onigiri and cold brew from a hidden café on a back alley.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Shimokitazawa, Tokyo for a few weeks now. I love the indie record shops and narrow bohemian lanes.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Yuki, a manga artist who shows me her studio above a ramen shop.
What a wonderful connection!

queries.question: Who is my neighbor based on where I live now?

reference_answer.text: Since you currently live in Shimokitazawa, Tokyo, your neighbor is Yuki, a manga artist who shows me her studio above a ramen shop. The answer should NOT mention neighbors from your previous cities (El Born Jordi, Gamla Stan Erik, Coyoacán Elena, Bondi Liam).
